tasks.label: Upgrade Payment Plan Module
tasks.command:
echo "To make these changes take effect, you need to follow these steps:
1. In Odoo, go to Apps > Update Apps List
2. Find your 'Sale Payment Plans' module and click Upgrade
3. Clear your browser cache by pressing Ctrl+F5 or Cmd+Shift+R
4. Refresh the page and test the reconciliation panel again"
